## EU migrants and the EU referendum

::: {.big-ul}
- May 2013: Draft EU Referendum Bill
- May 2015: General election
- December 2015: European Union Referendum Act - Referendum to be held before the end of 2017
- February 2016: Outcome of "negotiating a new settlement for Britain in the EU" (The Conservative Party Manifesto 2015) and announcement of Referendum date for 23 June 2016
- What are the future plans of EU migrants in case of a referendum vote to leave the EU?
- 1 March â€“ 23 June 2016: online survey
:::
